channel.title: My auth system = dead, read for details
channel.description:
As writing the next part of the tut i noticed i fucked up some code pretty bad and don't feel like chaning it all
SOOO I did some digging in google and found the original script that I had built mine off of. (mine was 3x bigger and more complex just i was cutting it down to the basics but i deleted some functions i needed)
sooo just use this: http://evolt.org/files/Login_System_v.2.0.zip
took a long time to find it....
has more features and shit since i had cut most of those out
